dreams: Start to talk to someone (even if it is myself!) about how I am feeling and what I need!
Not to measure my worth based on outward recognition of accomplishments
accountabilities: Don't wait for other people to call me out, instead be honest with myself
When I realize I've fucked up, brainstorm concrete strategies to avoid repeating the same fuck-up
Also apologizing as soon as I realize I have fucked-up, and actual apologies not fauxpologies
goods: To Love in This Way by Not That Kind of Asian Doctor
Wilson Wong is a super friend
quests: How do you feel when you say something abusive? Do you realize?

values: Being 'better' than other people, my sensitivity!
Receiving external accolades / my need to take things slowly
being busy just to be busy, the genuine love I have for people I care about
